contentrichtext.text: A '''ludobot''' is a type of [[artificial human companion]]: an [[entertainment robot]], from [[Latin]] ''ludo'' (play) and ''bot'' (robot). Examples are [[battlebots]], [[Sony]] [[Aibo]], [http://www.tigertoys.com Tiger Toys] ''GoGo My So Real Walking Pup'' and so on. Simpler is a [[digital pet]], a virtual pet simulated by a [[computer]]. Examples are [[Neopets]], [[Tamagotchi]]s, or [[Digipet]]s. ==See also== * [[Ifbot]] * [[QRIO]] * [[Wakamaru]] * [[Banryu]] * [[ASIMO]] * [[TOPIO]] * [[home robot]] == External links == * [http://allrobots.com/article.php3?id_article=17 Ifbot] from [http://www.business-design.co.jp Business Design Laboratory]. *[http://www.mhi.co.jp/enews/e_0936.html Mitsubishi Wakamaru]. *[http://www.sanyo.co.jp/koho/hypertext4-eng/0211news-e/1106-e.html Sanyo-Tmsuk Banryu]. {{Robotics}} [[Category:Entertainment robotics| ]] {{robot-stub}} {{toy-stub}}
